attributes.action: Allow people aged 16+ to vote on a second referendum if called.
attributes.additional_details: It is down to the younger generation to decide there future regarding the place of United Kingdom in the European Union. It should not be left to the older generation to decide a future for the generation that will be effected the most by the decision.
attributes.background: If there is a second referendum called to vote for the place of Great Britain in the European Union, to allow that people aged 16 plus can vote for there future regarding the country's place in the European Union.
